Psy 101 | Term 027: Horizontal Scalability

More users shouldn’t mean more bottlenecks.

Horizontal Scalability means you scale by adding workers — not rewriting the system.

On Psy, that means:
→ More Proof Miners
→ More parallel ZK aggregation
→ No central choke points https://t.co/OL0TiFVkC7
